options.name: adminPasswordFile
options.desc: File which contains the value of setup.admin_password .

options.name: caddy.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable exposing lemmy with the caddy reverse proxy.

options.name: database.createLocally
options.desc: Whether to enable creation of database on the instance.

options.name: database.uri
options.desc: The connection URI to use. Takes priority over the configuration fileif set.

options.name: database.uriFile
options.desc: File which contains the database uri.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable lemmy a federated alternative to reddit inrust.

options.name: nginx.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable exposing lemmy with the nginx reverse proxy.

options.name: pictrsApiKeyFile
options.desc: File which contains the value of  pictrs.api_key .

options.name: settings.captcha.difficulty
options.desc: The difficultly of the captcha to solve.

options.name: settings.hostname
options.desc: The domain name of your instance (eg ‘lemmy.ml’).

options.name: settings.port
options.desc: Port where lemmy should listen for incoming requests.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: smtpPasswordFile
options.desc: File which contains the value of email.smtp_password .

options.name: ui.port
options.desc: Port where lemmy-ui should listen for incoming requests.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)
